roleset.name: climb mountains
roleset.note: MOUNTAINEER-V, MOUNTAINEERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: mountaineer-v
example.text: She has conducted research in a National Aeronautics and Space Administration lab, mountaineered in the High Sierras,and lived in Italy.

example.name: mountaineering-n
example.text: Mountaineering on Olympus is not only a divine experience but also an option covering all levels of difficulty and stamina.
